thread.title: Honzo Kahaya

author: Honzo Kahaya
title: Honzo Kahaya
text: play-asia steal old orders. They can do cancel your new order or do verification for new order and with this crazy reason they take all your old orders. They not gave access to me to old orders two months, I did chargeback for old order, now they surprised why I did it and ask remove dispute. Dear play-asia, you was should think before remove my old orders. I warned you I will do chagreback, now you received it. I say to all clients if play-asia will remove access to your all old orders, one solution is only do chargeback. In other way they will spend empty your time and will just reply, sorry we can not do anything. If you can not do anything, for what you have support and team? Lets they go to home sleep then.
